DbSql.sql: select * from (SELECT schema_name as name FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.SCHEMATA) as derivedtbl_1
select * from (SELECT table_name as name,table_schema as cuser,table_type as type,create_time as dates ,version comments FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where table_type='BASE TABLE') as derivedtbl_1

select c.Column_Name as ColumnName,c.table_name AS TableName,data_type as TypeName,character_maximum_length as length,numeric_precision as preci, numeric_scale as scale,'' IsIdentity,IF(column_key='PRI','Y','N') as isPK,LEFT(is_nullable,1) as cisNull,column_default as defaultVal, column_comment as deText,referenced_table_name rftable,referenced_column_name rfcolumn,c.table_schema DataBaseType from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c left join INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE k on c.table_name=k.table_name and c.Column_Name=k.Column_Name where c.table_name='co_order'
